title: Practice Tests
question_text: Mrs. Sippi gives a practice AP test to her two sections of AP Statistics, each with $25$ students. Period F has a minimum of $59$ , a median of $81$ , a mean of $82$ , and a maximum of $98$ . Period G (G-Unit) has a minimum of $50$ percent, a median of $77$ , a mean of $84$ , and a maximum of $96$ . If Mrs. Sippi put all $50$ scores in one dataset and recalculated the minimum, maximum, mean, median, and range, which of the following MUST be true?

choices.text: The new median is 79 79 and the new maximum is 98 98 .
The new mean is 83 83 and the new range is 48 48 .
The new range is 46 46 and the new mean is 83 83 .
The new median is 79 79 and the new mean is 83 83 .
The new range is 48 48 and the new median is 79 79 .
